input: I was actually interested in getting a little more money considering I would really be interested in a Team manager position.
I understand, but would at least need to work an 8 hour day considering that is the industry benchmark for a Programmer or Team Manager position.
I am willing to take a 10% pension fund instead of 20% if you can increase the salary from 7,000 NIS to 12,000 NIS.
Actually, 7,000 NIS is less than I was looking for, especially if you aren't including a company car.
I would like 12,000 NIS, with a car, a 10% pension fund, fast promotion track, an 8 hour work day, and a Team Manager or Project Manager.
I appreciate you increasing the position from programmer to Team Manager, but must insist that I would make 12,000 NIS, especially with the increased responsibilities of a manger role.
hi, I would like 12k for work as a programmer, with an option for a company car, 20% pension, fast track promotion and 9 hour schedule
I'm ok with removing the company car but will require 20% pension if I work 10 hours
I also require a rate of 12k

What are you offering?

I accept!
I have my own car. That's not an issue as long as you can get me the Project Manager position at 20,000 NIS and 20% pension. I'd like to be on the fast track and working no more than 9 hours a day.
I'll accept no less than 12,000 as Project Manger, without a leased car, on fast track promotion with 20% in my pension. With this agreement, I'd like to work 8 hours.
